titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons, assembled in Parliament, for appointing a solemne day of thanksgiving, for the happy successe of the forces under Sir William Waller and Sir William Balfore, against the forces under the command of Sir Ralph Hopton, who were totally routed on the 29. of March last, 1644. Together with an ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, to enable the merchants of Levant company, to import in English bottomes any currans, and to land them within any port within the power of the Parliament. Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that these ordinances be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons, assembled in Parliament, for appointing a solemne day of thanksgiving, for the happy successe of the forces under Sir William Waller and Sir William Balfore, against the forces under the command of Sir Ralph Hopton, who were totally routed on the 29. of March last, 1644. Together with an ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, to enable the merchants of Levant company, to import in English bottomes any currans, and to land them within any port within the power of the Parliament. Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that these ordinances be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
